```{r, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
iris %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Length,
             y = Sepal.Width, 
             color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Sepal Length",
       y = "Sepal Width", 
       title = "Scatterplot of Sepal Length and Width")
```
